hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wal: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Medigoron sells the earliest Breath of the Wild demo.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of #gold#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #House of Twins#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #0# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #0# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Key-locked in Fire Temple? Maybe Volvagia has your Small Key.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Spinning Scythe Room

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Granny's Potion Shop#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...
